product_name: LAMO Driving Moc Slippers - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're headed across campus or just across the hall, the LAMO Driving Moc slippers keep your feet warm and snug thanks to soft, breathable sheepskin linings. Suede leather uppers with leather laces provide durable, flexible structure and support. Plush sheepskin linings insulate while remaining breathable, ideal for cool or warm days. EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles provide traction for outdoor use. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're headed across campus or just across the hall, the LAMO Driving Moc slippers keep your feet warm and snug thanks to soft, breathable sheepskin linings.
